about_the_game:
Unwind on the Open Road


Easy Breezy Drive is a relaxing, driving game built for providing a relaxing and serene escape. Cruise through stunning landscapes behind the wheel of your pickup truck, with no objectives or goals to pressure you. Choose your preferred perspective, dash cam or admire the scenery from a third-person view.

Lose Yourself in the Journey



Immerse yourself in the ever-changing world with dynamic weather systems (on applicable maps) as you journey through Spring, Summer, Autumn, and Winter. Each season transforms the vegetation and environment colors. Feel the wind on a clear day, navigate a gentle rain shower, or witness the mesmerizing transition into a starlit night. Crank up your favorite tunes or enjoy the game's electronic soundtrack as you explore sprawling environments.

Astral Voyage offers a unique celestial experience with breathtaking views of the aurora borealis, Milky Way, and moon. Cruise along to a music track that syncs with the road - listen for subtle changes and flourishes as you drive, creating an immersive soundscape that complements the otherworldly atmosphere.

Craft Your Perfect Escape



Adjust the weather and time of day(on applicable maps) to suit your mood. Craving a vibrant sunset cruise? A calming drive through the rain? Or a peaceful night under the stars? Easy Breezy Drive puts the control in your hands to create the perfect escape.

More Than Just a Drive


Easy Breezy Drive is more than just a drive, it's an escape for your senses. Climb in, feel the gentle hum of the engine, and lose yourself in the breathtaking beauty of the open road. Explore the lush greenery of "Pine Valley", cruise along the coastline in "Distant Horizons" or embark on a dreamy celestial journey under the aurora borealis in "Astral Voyage."

The Inspiration Behind the Drive


I've always craved games where you can simply cruise, unwind, and soak in the scenery. Easy Breezy Drive isn't just a project for me, it's the chance to finally share that feeling of a perfect road trip escape.

Open world driving games can be fun, but sometimes you just want to chill out and cruise. That's where Easy Breezy Drive comes in!

  • Set the mood - sunrise, sunset, starry night - and weather - rain, partly cloudy, snow etc. - for the perfect drive.
  • Relax to calming ambience and nature sounds.
  • Customize your drive with adjustable weather and time of day settings.
  • Unlike many driving games that prioritize speed and competition, Easy Breezy Drive is designed for relaxation and exploration, with plenty of opportunities to cruise along scenic routes

Happy Driving!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX-9590 / Intel Core i7-7700HQ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1650 (Low / Med Settings)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 5600X / Intel Core i9-9900k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3060 ti (High Settings)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended

short_description: Crank the tunes, and hit the open road in Easy Breezy Drive! This relaxing driving experience lets you cruise endless roads behind the wheel of vehicle of your choice. No objectives, no pressure, just you, your tunes, the endless roads, and enough scenery to make your eyeballs happy.
